snippet: Speaker John A. Boehner is faced with lawmakers on the far right openly chafing at his leadership and some pragmatists pressing for quick accommodation on tax rate increases on the rich.
abstract: House Speaker John A Boehner moves to maintain Republican unity on deficit reduction talks as lawmakers on far right openly chafe at his leadership and some pragmatists press for quick accommodation on tax rate increases on the wealthy.
lead_paragraph: Speaker John A. Boehner is faced with lawmakers on the far right openly chafing at his leadership and some pragmatists pressing for quick accommodation on tax rate increases on the rich.

headline.main: Boehner Tries to Contain Defections on Fiscal Unity
headline.print_headline: Boehner Tries to Contain Defections on Fiscal Unity
